casebody.data:
Leman vs. Saunders et al. October 16, 1883. Blandeord, Justice.

1. .This case is controlled by that of Kleckley vs. Leyden, 63 Ga., 215.

2. There was no abuse of discretion in refusing to grant a new trial on the ground that the verdict was contrary to law and evidence. Judgment affirmed.
